div.p: This code system https://kip.rkkp.dk/fhir/CodeSystem/NIHSS1aLOC defines the following codes:

tr.td: Not alert; but arousable by minor stimulation to obey, answer, or respond.
Not alert; requires repeated stimulation to attend, or is obtunded and requires strong or painful stimulation to make movements (not stereotyped).
Responds only with reflex motor or autonomic effects or totally unresponsive, flaccid, and areflexic.

title.value: The National Institute of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS) - 1a. Level of Consciousness

publisher.value: Sundhedsvæsnets Kvalistetsinstitut with Trifork Digital Health A/S

name.value: Sundhedsvæsnets Kvalistetsinstitut with Trifork Digital Health A/S

description.value: The National Institute of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS) - 1a. Level of Consciousness; Link: https://www.ninds.nih.gov/stroke-scales-and-related-information

definition.value: Not alert; but arousable by minor stimulation to obey, answer, or respond.
Not alert; requires repeated stimulation to attend, or is obtunded and requires strong or painful stimulation to make movements (not stereotyped).
Responds only with reflex motor or autonomic effects or totally unresponsive, flaccid, and areflexic.
